subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Reliever Tom Gordon became the first member of the World Series-champion Phillies to file for free agency after Philadelphia declined a $4.5 million option and chose to pay a $1 million buyout.
snippet: Reliever Tom Gordon became the first member of the World Series-champion Phillies to file for free agency after Philadelphia declined a $4.5 million option and chose to pay a $1 million buyout.
